roleset.name: jurisdictional: have a responsibility owed to someone/something

example.name: duty-n
example.text: When Michael finds the courage to act on what his duty toward other children demands -- submit to voluntary neutering -- which will be tantamount to his final confession , the saving grace and glory that is his Neverland will become his forever land .
